.. _releases-index:

Release notes
=============

Releases notes for the official Transifex releases. Each release note will tell you
what's new in each version, and will also describe any backwards-incompatible
changes made in that version.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   0.8
   0.7
   0.6
   0.5
   0.4
   0.3
